attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I definitely DO NOT recommend this app! When I opened the app someone seemed to of hacked the app and put a picture of p**p as the opening image of the app. DISCUSTING, and then I went to go get some water, but when I opened my door I saw DIXIE DAMOOLIO, wearing all maga mercy, singing be happy, I’m now hiding under my bed. BE CAREFUL

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app stole the money from me and my mom. It was just like the last one that was going back to my house. I am just furious because I’m so annoying and you don’t want to talk to me. So you don’t have to go to Hawaii this morning with me. SAVE TIKTOK 2020

attributes.title: HORRIBLE 😡😡😡

attributes.title: I’m mad
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I wanted to support orange man but it hacked my iPhone and made my new iPhone call me a libtard then it said it’s gonna go build a wall I don’t know what’s happening send help my phone has a knife and is telling me to commit mass genocide

attributes.title: WHO PUT THE MUFFINS IN THE FREEZER✨🍑
attributes.review: i DO NOT recommend this app!! after i downloaded it, MUFFINS POPPED UP IN MY FREEZER!!!! this nonsense must come to an end!! also this app stole my bed so now i have to sleep on my floor! im gonna say less bc y’all always wanna say more. please do not download this app because it gave me a lot of warts on my tounge!! attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER CREATED
attributes.review: This app is BY FAR the most poorly put together thing on this earth(besides the Trump campaign). I wanted unbiased and accurate information but all I got was FAKE NEWS. Trump and his campaign managers must be the most illiterate, uneducated human beings in America if they thought THIS was good?????? Needs to be deleted.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: As soon as I got this app my entire phone began to glitch. Not just the app it’s self. Every time I try and open the app it kicks me out and calls me a libtard. Unbelievably unprofessional. I advise that you fix your app before I ask to see the manager!

attributes.title: DELETE IMMEDIATELY
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it, I realize how much of a mistake I made. This app is not worth the storage on hour phone/device. Please try settling for another president in the upcoming election. Deleted this app immediately after I downloaded

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was expecting to find a space where appropriate and civilized political discussions were held. Instead I found that this app and those who use it are bigoted, racist, white supremacists that spread hatred everywhere they go.
